actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide certain additional protection from reduction for the disability ratings of veterans with service-connected disabilities rated total for not less than ten years.

summary.text: Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to provide that a rating of total disability or permanent total disability which has been made for purposes of the administration of veterans' benefits, and which has been continuously in force for ten or more years but which has been proposed to be reduced under a decision made by the Department of Veterans Affairs, may not be reduced during the period of any administrative appeal of such decision.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide certain additional protection from reduction for the disability ratings of veterans with service-connected disabilities rated total for not less than ten years.
